displayProperties.description: Ghost informs you that he's being spammed, non-stop, with messages from a malfunctioning maintenance frame somewhere in the Tower. "It just keeps saying 'a summons,' over and over," he says. "Let's see if we can find it."
displayProperties.name: An Imperial Summons
